mapper.delete: delete from post_replies where post_id=#{postId} and reply_id>0
mapper.insert: insert into post_replies(post_id, replier_id, replied_floor, text, created_at, floor) values(#{postId},#{replierId},#{repliedFloor},#{text},#{createdDate},(select current_floor+1 from posts where post_id=#{postId}))
